page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The majority of our block is covered by farmland which is virtually all arable land.Apart from the typical type of farm growing wheat and barley there is also a stables which trains racehorses. There are two small villages containing 1500 inhabitants,each of which contain the necessary amenities such as foodstores,hairdressers, library,bank,health centre and public houses.The inhabitants tend to commute to nearby Cambridge to work or even as far as London.Apart from shops the only real source of employment is a large Paper Mill.
